**Liverpool's late win at Nottingham Forest has boosted their top-four hopes in the Premier League.**
## Context / Background
The match between Liverpool and Nottingham Forest ended with a dramatic late goal from Alexis Mac Allister, securing a 1-0 win for Liverpool. This victory has significant implications for Liverpool's position in the Premier League table.

## Tactical Key Points / Stats Table
| Team | Possession | Shots on Target |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Liverpool | 55% | 5 |
| Nottingham Forest | 45% | 2 |

The tactical approach by both teams led to a tightly contested match, with Liverpool's persistence paying off in the end.

> 'It was a great team effort, and we showed our mentality to keep pushing until the end,' said a Liverpool spokesperson, though the exact quote is not available.

## What's Next?
Liverpool's win puts pressure on other teams vying for a top-four spot. Their upcoming schedule will be crucial in determining their final position in the league.
